title: Un Homme d'honneur
overview: Richard Altman is an upright and respected judge. He sees his life turned upside down when his son runs over a biker and leaves him for dead. At first, Richard Altman pushes his son to denounce himself. But, when he realizes that the victim is the son of a powerful mafia. The judge will deny all his ideals and begin a real descent into hell to protect his son ...Â
